title: Launcher problems on Pixel 4a with every Launcher but the stock one.
content:
I got an issue. When I do the home swipe and want to open another app there is always a little hickup as if the launcher would restart.
Im on latest OS and nova launcher. How can i solve this?

This also happens on other third party launchers.
Even if I set them as default. No developer options. In stock launcher it is very smooth, but I need the customization.

Here is a little demonstration:
